Nice game

Что сказать игра в целом неплохая:
+плюсы
1)Классная концовка и в целом сюжетная линия! Саспенс на уровне)
2)атмосферные  уровни и харизматичные основные персонажи.

-минусы
1)Практически отсутствует как таковое разнообразие NPC (Одинаковые лица, одежда, разговоры) и это скажу я вам сильно раздражает ведь игра поначалу кажется просто замечательной но на первой же локации немного побегав начинаешь замечать эти недостатки, с учетом того что влито в эту игру около 200 миллионов и игра в целом коридорный шутер можно было и постараться над разнообразием уровней и лиц окружающих тебя NPC((( 
2)Недоработка геймплея а именно эта игра один из самых скучных шутеров что я играл прыгает персонаж с крюка на крюк как бог, но пуль не хватает (я так понял разрабы не определились толи закосить под реал толи волшебство и все такое) а большинство способностей даже на харде просто не понадобятся.
3) Довольно короткая сюжетная линия 17 часов на харде без старания(((( опять же коридорный шутан(!!!!
4)Для кого как но мне еще сильно резал глаза графон в плане того что все какое то чутка квадратное на максималках((
Лицо той же Элизабет даже близко с постером не стоит((!!
Итог:
-Хоть и минусов больше но советую играть из за классного сюжета очень редкая вещь для игр !!!! Да и на  летающий город в облаках посмотреть)))
This game is a masterpiece.

Forget GOTY 2013, this legend deserves a Game Of All Time award. Stunning visuals, characters so alive and full of emotion that you'll dream about them for months, mind blowing gameplay and plot twists within plot twists, it'd be a sin not to play Bioshock : Infinite.
Inventif et humour noir!! Un régal!!!

그리고 제일 안타까운건 전작들처럼 카르마에 따라 엔딩이 바뀌는 게 없다는 거?

BioShock Infinite is hands down one of the best games I've ever played. The game offers a very rich and unique storyline. Gameplay is amazing.The graphics are just fantastic and still looks very good today. I give Bioshock Infinite a 10/10 and recommend it to all gamers!

바이오쇼크 시리즈는 너무나 놀랍고 충격적이다.   난 이세계와 인물들에게 흠뻑 빠져있었다. 

싱글 FPS 기준으로도 가볍게 즐기는걸 좋아하는 입장에서(보통난이도) 쉽고 다양한 무기와 플라즈마는 재미라는 

원초적 즐거움에 부합한다.  

 크리스토퍼 놀란 감독처럼 완벽주의 강박이 느껴지는 연출 디자인또한 대단하다.
 모든 배경이 이야기를 표현하는  놀라움을 선사한다. 

너무나 치밀하고 극적인 상황과 사회대립적 인과관계의 표현은 게임이 끝난후에도 한참동안 정신을 차릴수 없게 만든다.

장르를 불문하고 모두가 꼭 해봐야 한다고 생각한다.
i love this game at first sight ~

First time playing this game, my initial thoughts from it at first was a storyline where certain levels are themed as like from those horror titles in the main game - the 2 BaS DLCs however is purposefully themed for that genre, gameplay and levels that continuously add this addiction where I must keep on playing till the end, mediocre graphics and finally finding out why was this game so popular during its release.

When you progress through the game, the levels do get slightly difficult but it is not an unusual thing in gaming. The variety of weapons to keep with you in the main game is my gripe compared to the DLCs. It's like going to a war starting with your only weapon then take or steal more. But being a Bioshock game means you do have vigors to use to attack or defend from enemies, just like the fighters from Dragonball Z. The maps are not as linear as typical war-genre games but I would think the map should be more open enough just not to fall off the map.

Overall, the hidden collectables I didn't managed to find all of them, the whole storyline, combat and the graphics are excellent. I just think the dialogues could be improved more to add the energy of the characters to their full extent.

Come to think of, if anyone was wondering the ridiculously long playtime I achieved was all because off my addiction pointing the gun at Liz and watch her reacting to it. Yes, sad but I just did, many times. Oh, and the screenshots I was taking if the game.
Just played the trilogy, changed my life. 10/10 Mind F*ck

План действий для этой игры:
1) Начать играть.
2) Не понимать что происходит.
3) Убивать, убивать, убивать!
4) Найти девчёнку.
5) Влюбиться.
6) Забыть что ты в реальном мире.
7) Всей душей ненавидеть антагониста.
8) Убивать, убивать, убивать! 
9) В панике бегать в поисках патронов что-бы продолжить убивать.
10) Пройти игру. Выпасть в осадок от концовки. Сидеть и курить.
_____________________________________________

Лучший сюжет что я видел за всю жизнь. Никогда еще перонажи видеоигр так не цепляли меня за душу как история Букера и Элизабет. Концовка убила наповал. А помимо сюжета есть еще великолепная, красочная графика, полное погружение в игровой процесс и насыщенный экшн. 
Вердикт: 76 патронов для карабина из 76 возможных.
Loved every minute of it and is one of the only games in my library to date  that  i have actually finished.

Ugh this game absolutly amazing. The story was deep and engaging while being well paced. There was a fantastic mixture of themes and ideas with the turn of American in the 1900's, the suppression of minorities plays a fantastic part in the overall stuggle of the different characters in the world of BioShock Infinite and with already an incredibly deep lore thanks to the original first BioShock game BioShock Infinite adds to that lore and uses the already existing lore to its full advantage  

P.S. That last part was also talking about the DLC Burial at Sea Episode One and Two which I recommend you buy if you really want to explore in to this deep univerese that is the BioShock universe
게임하고 지려보기는 처음이다.

As a person who couldnt care less about Bioshock, and steampunk in general (cyberpunk>all)  this was a real step up from the previous installments.  though it does kind of drag on towards the end and gameplay gets a little repetative.  but the story and presentation holds you till the end.

Mind boggling story, but the gameplay is insanely fun and inventive. Beautiful art direction and one of the most original ideas for a game I've seen in a while. I dunno how to sum up my feelings for it at once, but just play it, dammit. One of the best I've played.

I don't know what to say...
The gameplay was very active and fast, which I personally like, and didn't contain too much horror (like BioShock 1 did for my eyes). The story was just great, still don't know how and what happened.

Haven't played too much, but from the first hour I was able to see just how much work has been put into making this game, long story based around 'capturing' a girl named Elizabeth. 

This is a FPS storydriven game with lots of detail put into each level with beautiful graphics. There are multiple glitches however, in the first 20 minutes I had to restart because one of the carnival games would freeze whenever I tried to play it more than once, I searched for help and learned that many other people have this problem, but there was no solution that worked.
劇情很棒，遊戲性也不錯，近來玩過最佳遊戲之一。支援繁體中文字幕。硬體要求不高，僅有特定場景會有掉禎情形但並不影響遊戲體驗。天空之城的風景很漂亮，很適合邊玩邊拍照。
BioShock он и в Африке BioShock, как всегда сюжет завораживает!
Esse jogo surpreende a principio pelo gráfico, a ambientação é magfifica, propondo uma imersão rara no mundo dos games. O enredo é um dos melhores que já vi em um game. Eu daria nota 10/10.

Sad and has a great story to tell, you probably should play bioshock first though. This is an amazingly good game, you should try it out. Its worth the $30. The most beautiful game I've ever played, so thoughtful, confusing and impressive. Everthing about this game is art from gameplay to soundtrack to story. Everything is so polished and thoughtover. Ties the whole Bioshock series together and makes endless possiblities at the same time. Playing it more than once only inhances the expierience of the game. This is the game I'd play for the next 100 years if I had to. 2K please make another one, I'll pay you anything for it! This game is what makes gaming great, I wish more games were like this one. Gameplay is challenging, story is superb, and  I can't see any way that this game could be better, other than some dated graphics but this is barely noticable. I'll be honest, the first time I played this game I didn't understand the game, but the second time made me realize all the time and beauty put into this game. All the audio designers, animators, voice actors, programmers, and concept designers put their love and care into this game. This game is as close as you'll get to heaven in this life. By and by, theres a better home a waiting, in the sky, oh in the sky. This actually could be a good movie adaption, if they did do it. This is the kind of game that makes you cry at the end, don't get me wrong. All great pieces of art should wether its a great game, tv show, or movie.

Huge fan of the Bioshock series. This one looked very different but in a good way. I just had to see how the storyline went from the bottom of the ocean to a city in the sky.

I enjoyed the scenery, story and characters very much. The combat not so much. It was fun but just a tad bit repetitive. The ziplines did add a nice touch of extra mobility but felt forced in some of the areas.

Overall I still very much enjoyed the game.

Immerse yourself in the soaring world of Columbia, a dystopian alternative universe with a jawdropping atmosphere, corrupted by the misguidance of its fervent and fanatic leader. Defy modern physics and march your way through this adventurous wonderland as you try to uncover the secrets and mysteries it holds.

This is the only game I've ever played where the DLC is better than the main game.  It was so awesome that I knew that I could never top that experience in the game again.

Seriously, you know the feeling when you get so upset at a game that you uninstall it and throw it away?  This is the complete opposite.  So happy with this game that I uninstalled it and put it on a pedestal in my mind so my last memories of it are the best.

点进来吓了我一跳，居然解锁了，那我就补一发DLC压压惊吧。
Elizabeth这个人物在我心中留下很深印象，各种意义上心理加分不少。
虽然我蒸汽朋克的作品接触得不多，不怎么能细细赏析个所以然来，但画面配乐给我整体感觉良好。
可能我有些幽闭恐惧症深海什么什么的，所以相对于初代，无限的氛围让我感到轻松。
手感各种爽，伊丽莎白做队友，想怎么突突突就怎么突突突
剧情方面，是我的话会因看到其他人的剧情整理，而马上放弃继续自己不完整的脑补，我先是因完全了解剧情而有醍醐灌顶的感觉，之后看着别人的劳动成果而稍微觉得剧情没味道了。看了没味道，不看又可惜。

总之买买买
这游戏绝对是一个神作，建议补完dlc，之后去补1，2代。

Buen juego a nivel de historia, grafico, etc. Nada en contra de el, salvo que se me quedo un poco corto, o yo fui muy rapido. Un final que te encantara, o al menos te dejara confundido y te hara pensar. Una historia enrevesada que hara que te enganches y no lo dejes hasta acabar. Eso si, procura reservar municion y demas para lo importante y indispensable, pues avanzar en el juego se te hara un coñazo si gastas rapido y no repones (o compras mas).
